1.0: (Shorter version from Otzrot Chaim): Know that at the beginning, the entirety of existence, was simple light, what is called Ein Sof (no end). And when it arose in the will of the creator to delegate (their own) nobility, for the known reason, and that is - to be called 'the Merciful and gracious one' 'the One who is slow to anger' etc. Because if there is no one in the world to receive mercy from the divine, how will It be called merciful? and like that with all the other godly nicknames.

0.0: First palace of seven palaces and which is the hall of Adam Kadmon, and in this palace are seven gates:
0.3: Regarding the ultimate goal of the creation of the worlds which will now be clarified in two inquiries which the Kabbalists dealt with. The first inquiry is that which the first- and the last ones inquired to know the reason of the creation of the worlds to which reason
0.2: Explanation of the round [lights] and direct [lights] including five branches

0.2: 3. Heichal Beit Derushei points: We  will now discuss the world of points these are of the aspect of lights that come through the eyes of Adam Kadmon. We have already explained that there are 4 aspects within them and these are the 4 YHVH Av Sag Ben Mah. and in each level there is cantillations points crowns letters The brain of Adam Kadmon is Ayin Bet. From the ears downward all the way to the feet is Sag. However this idea existed before the end of the kings in the Bounded world and afterwards it was the aspect of Mah and Ben from the place of the belly till lower below the feet as was written. We have already explained that in the name Sag there is cantillations points crowns letters the cantillations  are split into 3 parts which are named Back of the Front However the points are of the aspect of lights that are drawn from his eyes. The idea is that the breath that comes from the opening of the ears is a small air for if a man puts his finger in his ear and holds it there he will here a voice of moving. This is because of the movement of the air that is within and is trying to go out and is unable to. However as soon as he pulls out his finger the sound quiets and we see that from his ears this air comes out as ten sefirot of the aspect of ears as explained above. Afterwards the nose has air that is stronger and comes out from here the ten sefirot of the nose. and afterwards in the mouth there is air more powerful from all of the others because  all the light that goes down is more apparent and powerful and is revealed there and  out from it comes the ten sefirot of Bounded. These are three places of the aspects of cantillations of SAG. Afterwards from the eyes comes out the points of Sag therefore the air from the eyes is not as powerful as the three other openings. Because the light of the small points of points are not as powerful as the cantillations. But with all this we see a small amount of strength in seeing with the eyes as is seen with the senses of the eyes naturally as the idea of bat hayana that is born by the efroach from looking at it for a time unlike other birds that sit on there eggs and hatch it. This proves the apparent power of seeing with the eyes. and behold from this looking of the eyes produces points. From this we understand what is written in Tikkunim #70 That the number 126 that makes up YHVH  from the 4 letters in the form of eyes with their points  In the secret of their back was filled with eyes. The image is shown at the end of this sefer.All the aspects of points eyes to dots When you count from Ayin Bet we see all the  aspects of Bet:

2.1: B And we return to above where we explained that the points are divided into three parts. the upper ones are on top of the letters like the cholem is in the middle and the shorek is under the letters like the rest of the points and behold the point of the cholem is the breath emanating from the navel where the crown stands as mentioned above since  the crown is the cholem on  the Tiferet as it is known that the main idea of is in tiferet of AK . Indeed, a crown is made for the points and that is whats written  in the fifth correction  for the root of the cholem of keter באתוון as we know and the points of shorek in a vav is called melafum that is in the middle and is the breath that comes out from foundation to the father and mother and is divided into two fro here the point of shorek is a vav yud in the middle and we see that the yud of shorek is for the father, who is called the first yud of the name YHVH and the vav  of Shorek, is for the mother to bring out and give birth to the vak of  ZA, and this is the grade of vav  which takes the mother. And also ט"א for its nekudot are like the yud of shorek that is the letter vav from which is nurtured the motherof nekudim as is known for the nekudot of wisdom and also binah and the 7 lower nekudot  with the three grades that are one NHY of keter and 2 achorayim of Abba and Imma we see these add up to ten these are the ten that come out from the fingernails of the feet and father of the whistler is the sixth letter from which mother draws dunkim as it is known that the points of wisdom and Ativan Bina and the lower points with J And they do not intend to say that these are the points themselves, except that of all these vanities light came out to the 10 points that went out through the eye as above and remember this , And there is a question here that is that the basic world is in the knowledge that we find that the basis of the Dama is the opinion of ZA and the basis of this Ak is the opinion of the dots and then how the mammals Av "Abel departing institutionalized AK" And the answer is that in the world of the world, it is higher than the two parts of Pirkein. It does not appear to be in the sense of God, and therefore it is necessary that the opinion be higher than that of the father and mother. To give him Mochin is humiliating herself and bowing to the secret of the mother lying on the chicks and then he must raise Rishi thighs very high and in the core of her down below them and then found that the opinion below Chabad and the son is indeed
2.0: And we see when these points spread out from the outside from next navel of AK until the end of his legs as above, the same light that came anew in the inner by way of a curtain as above and go out and illuminate the points and we find that this new light passes through first and goes by way of the curtain down below the lower half from the belly  After that, it reappears and emerges through the walls of the body and goes out and illuminates the dots. It is written in the book of corrections, one curtain is  between the crown and the highest of the high, for each aspect of the emanator alone is called the highest of the high . But these points that were spread from belly of AK until the end of his feet, as the ZON order, which is enclothed in Arich Anpin, but there Zon is enclothed  in Arich Anpin on all sides  and the surrounding areas, but here the source of illumination is only through the face of AK, But it spreads a little illumination from these points whether of the grade of their lights or vessels and they are enclothed this AK from all sides the way we explained above in Achor Panim but most of the illumination is through the face, and the crown is from the points whose  place is from the navel of AK until the end of the body, and HBD is  in the first three perakim of NHY of AK and HGT, in the middle three perakim and NHY in the lower three perakim by way we mentioned in Zun that enclothes Arich Anpin as mentioned in its place and there is two lights that goes out from the body of AK and they are one from the belly and the second from the mouth of Yesod and they go out from there 2 breaths and according to what it should be there should be three breaths according to the three firsts that were taken from the achor panim as mentioned but according to the lack of light the ear from Abba and Imma as above so therefore missing also is the aspect of breath that is according to the ear and only 2 breaths came out that are according to the nose And mouth alone, from which they received Abba and Imma to above, and here too also below are received from them but the light of the seven lower that is only taken from the body  is from the end of the beard and below as mentioned therefore they dont have breaths to illuminate them but it is hinted to in the secret of the pasuk  ויפוזו זרועי ידיו  That is the secret of  it emanated from his fingernails is mentioned in Tikkun  69 as it was known that they themselves are the aspect of Kings are because the cancellation of the kings was because they were not yet corrected as a human being male and  female. This is the secret of Joseph's seed tips that came out without a female but from a male alone , and they are the ten killed by kings  and understand well the word king that they are really those seven kings who broke their vessels and bodies. And the reason was also because there was no correction of them  until Hadar king 8 then they were rectified  This is also the secret of what is written in Tractate Shavuot in pg. 3 Whoever his wife said to him at the time of his being unclean, his fingernails will stick in the ground, and the seed will come out through the fingernails of the feet, and will spread out . 'And the points that are similar to kings these are the seven that came out from the nails of the feet and even though there are 10 nails  and the points that broke were 7 lower only as mentioned The point is that there are also two types of achorayim  of Abba and Imma that came off we see there are 9 aspects and the tenth  is that even from the crown there was some flaw in it, as it is written before that they were the aspect of NHY of it that came forth and was in the secret of brains to father and mother  And they too were broken and they were 10 according to the ten breaths that came out from the nails of the feet and all grades of coming out are these 10 breaths,by way of the nails were in the aspect of not being able to receive from the light of the upper ear  as mentioned therefore this idea caused all of this including the nullification of the kings.

0.0: Gate fifty, gate ABY"A [Atzilut, Brieya, Yetzira, Asieya] containing ten chapters:
